content: around the bpdc below for both r26 and r27 r26 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc 1 double_crochet *1 double_crochet bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc 1 double_crochet* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 12 double_crochet 24 bpdc 18 fpdc r27 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc 1 double_crochet *1 double_crochet fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc 1 double_crochet* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 12 double_crochet 24 fpdc 18 bpdc r28 - chain 5 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet skip 2 sts double_crochet in next st chain 2 skip 2 sts *double_crochet in next st chain 2 skip 2 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 18 double_crochet 18 chain-2 spaces r29 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet tc 3-chain picot double_crochet in chain-2 space *double_crochet in next st double_crochet tc 3-chain picot double_crochet in chain-2 space * repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 54 double_crochet 18 tc 18 picots fasten_off and weave in ends strap r1 - chain 5 5 chains r2 - starting in the 2nd chain single_crochet across 4 single_crochet turn r3 - chain 1 single_crochet across 4 single_crochet turn r4 - - repeat r3 until strap is long enough to both weave through holes made in r28 and act as a cross-body strap weave strap through holes made in r28 slip_stitch ends of strap together and fasten_off weave in ends enjoy your new bag
